name: retrieve_the_hardiness_zone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool plant_hardiness_zone.
Tool description: Retrieve the USDA Plant Hardiness Zone for a ZIP code
API description: Pass a ZIP code in the endpoint path to return an object that includes the ZIP code and USDA Plant Hardiness Zone.

zipcode.description: The ZIP code for which to retrieve the hardiness zone.
